From M&S, problem 4.50

## packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## make the data (designed experiment)

```{r}
txt="
60.58
72.72
79.99
66.83
80.78
89.78
69.18
80.31
91.99
"
(d=read_csv(txt,col_names="oil_recovery"))
```

and then

```{r}
pressures=c(1000,1500,2000)
dip_angles=c(0,15,30)
(conds=crossing(pressure=pressures,dip_angle=dip_angles))
```

combine

```{r}
conds %>% bind_cols(d) %>% 
  write_csv("crudeoil.csv")
```
